00066 template<class T> class ArrayPtrs

00071 protected:

00078     int _size;
00080     int _capacity;
00083     int _capacityIncrement;
00085     T **_array;

00094 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00103 virtual ~ArrayPtrs()
00104 {
00105     if(_memoryOwner) clearAndDestroy();
00106 
00107     // ARRAY
00108     delete[] _array;
00109     _array = NULL;
00110 }
00111 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00118 ArrayPtrs(int aCapacity=1)
00119 {
00120     setNull();
00121 
00122     // CAPACITY
00123     if(aCapacity<1)  aCapacity = 1;
00124     ensureCapacity(aCapacity);
00125 
00126 }
00127 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00133 ArrayPtrs(const ArrayPtrs<T> &aArray)
00134 {
00135     setNull();
00136     *this = aArray;
00137 }

00141 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00145 void setNull()
00146 {
00147     _memoryOwner = true;
00148     _size = 0;
00149     _capacityIncrement = -1;
00150     _capacity = 0;
00151     _array = NULL;
00152 }

00155 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00164 void clearAndDestroy()
00165 {
00166     if(_array==NULL) return;
00167     
00168     int i;
00169     for(i=0;i<_size;i++) {
00170         delete _array[i];  _array[i]=NULL;
00171     }
00172 
00173     _size = 0;
00174 }

00196 #ifndef SWIG
00197 ArrayPtrs<T>& operator=(const ArrayPtrs<T> &aArray)
00198 {
00199     // DELETE OLD ARRAY
00200     if(_memoryOwner) clearAndDestroy();
00201 
00202     // COPY MEMBER VARIABLES
00203     _size = aArray._size;
00204     _capacity = aArray._capacity;
00205     _capacityIncrement = aArray._capacityIncrement;
00206 
00207     // ARRAY
00208     int i;
00209     if(_array!=NULL) delete[] _array;
00210     _array = new T*[_capacity];
00211     for(i=0;i<_size;i++) {
00212         if(aArray._array[i]!=NULL)  _array[i] = (T*)aArray._array[i]->copy();
00213     }
00214 
00215     // TAKE OWNERSHIP OF MEMORY
00216     _memoryOwner = true;
00217 
00218     return(*this);
00219 }
00220

00223 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00238 T* operator[](int aIndex) const
00239 {
00240     return( _array[aIndex] );
00241 }

00257 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &aOut,const ArrayPtrs<T> &aArray)
00258 {
00259     aOut << "ArrayPtrs[" << aArray.getSize() <<"] =";
00260 
00261     int i;
00262     T* obj;
00263     for(i=0;i<aArray.getSize();i++)  {
00264         aOut << " ";
00265         obj = aArray[i];
00266         if(obj==NULL) {
00267             aOut << "NULL";
00268         } else {
00269             // The following line is having trouble compiling on IRIX.
00270             //aOut << *obj;
00271         }
00272     }
00273 
00274     return(aOut);
00275 }

00311 //=============================================================================
00312 // CAPACITY
00313 //=============================================================================
00314 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00336 bool computeNewCapacity(int aMinCapacity,int &rNewCapacity)
00337 {
00338     rNewCapacity = _capacity;
00339     if(rNewCapacity < 1) rNewCapacity = 1;
00340 
00341     // CHECK FOR ZERO INCREMENT
00342     if(_capacityIncrement == 0) {
00343         printf("ArrayPtrs.computeNewCapacity: WARN- capacity is set");
00344         printf(" not to increase (i.e., _capacityIncrement==0).\n");
00345         return(false);
00346     }
00347 
00348     // INCREMENT UNTIL LARGER THAN THE MINIMUM SIZE
00349     while(rNewCapacity < aMinCapacity) {
00350         if(_capacityIncrement < 0) {
00351             rNewCapacity = 2 * rNewCapacity;
00352         } else {
00353             rNewCapacity = rNewCapacity + _capacityIncrement;
00354         }
00355     }
00356 
00357     return(true);
00358 }
00359 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00367 bool ensureCapacity(int aCapacity)
00368 {
00369     // CHECK REQUESTED CAPACITY
00370     if(aCapacity < 1) aCapacity = 1;
00371     if(_capacity>=aCapacity) return(true);
00372 
00373     // ALLOCATE THE NEW ARRAY
00374     int i;
00375     T **newArray = new T*[aCapacity];
00376     if(newArray==NULL) {
00377         printf("ArrayPtrs.ensureCapacity: ERR- failed to increase capacity.\n");
00378         return(false);
00379     }
00380 
00381     // COPY CURRENT ARRAY
00382     if(_array!=NULL) {
00383         for(i=0;i<_size;i++) newArray[i] = _array[i];
00384         for(i=_size;i<aCapacity;i++) newArray[i] = NULL;
00385         delete[] _array;
00386     } else {
00387         for(i=0;i<aCapacity;i++) newArray[i] = NULL;
00388     }
00389     
00390     // REASSIGN
00391     _capacity = aCapacity;
00392     _array = newArray;
00393 
00394     return(true);
00395 }
00396 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00404 void trim()
00405 {
00406     // COMPUTE NEW CAPACITY
00407     int newCapacity = _size + 1;
00408     if(newCapacity>=_capacity) return;
00409     if(newCapacity<1) newCapacity = 1;
00410 
00411     // TEMPORARY ARRAY
00412     T **array = _array;
00413 
00414     // ALLOCATE NEW ARRAY
00415     _array = new T*[newCapacity];
00416     if(_array==NULL) {
00417         printf("ArrayPtrs.trim: ERR- unable to allocate array.\n");
00418         return;
00419     }
00420 
00421     // RESET PREVIOUS VALUES
00422     int i;
00423     for(i=0;i<_size;i++) _array[i] = array[i];
00424     _array[_size] = NULL;
00425 
00426     // SET CORRECT CAPACITY
00427     _capacity = newCapacity;
00428 
00429     // DELETE OLD ARRAY
00430     delete[] array;
00431 }
00432 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00436 int getCapacity() const
00437 {
00438     return(_capacity);
00439 }

00470 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00471 // SIZE
00472 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00473 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00491 bool setSize(int aSize)
00492 {
00493     if(aSize==_size) return(true);
00494     if(aSize>_size) return(false);
00495     if(aSize<0) aSize = 0;
00496     if(aSize<_size) {
00497         int i;
00498         for(i=(_size-1);i>=aSize;i--) {
00499             if(_array[i]!=NULL) {
00500                 if(getMemoryOwner()) { delete _array[i]; }
00501                 _array[i] = NULL;
00502             }
00503         }
00504         _size = aSize;
00505     }
00506 
00507     return(true);
00508 }
00509 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00515 int getSize() const
00516 {
00517     return(_size);
00518 }
00519 
00520 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00521 // INDEX
00522 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00523 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00534 int getIndex(const T *aObject,int aStartIndex=0) const
00535 {
00536     if(aStartIndex<0) aStartIndex=0;
00537     if(aStartIndex>=getSize()) aStartIndex=0;
00538 
00539     // SEARCH STARTING FROM aStartIndex
00540     int i;
00541     for(i=aStartIndex;i<getSize();i++) {
00542         if(_array[i] == aObject) return(i);
00543     }
00544 
00545     // SEARCH FROM BEGINNING
00546     for(i=0;i<aStartIndex;i++) {
00547         if(_array[i] == aObject) return(i);
00548     }
00549 
00550     return(-1);
00551 }
00552 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00563 int getIndex(const std::string &aName,int aStartIndex=0) const
00564 {
00565     if(aStartIndex<0) aStartIndex=0;
00566     if(aStartIndex>=getSize()) aStartIndex=0;
00567 
00568     // SEARCH STARTING FROM aStartIndex
00569     int i;
00570     for(i=aStartIndex;i<getSize();i++) {
00571         if(_array[i]->getName() == aName) return(i);
00572     }
00573 
00574     // SEARCH FROM BEGINNING
00575     for(i=0;i<aStartIndex;i++) {
00576         if(_array[i]->getName() == aName) return(i);
00577     }
00578 
00579     return(-1);
00580 }

00582 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00583 // APPEND
00584 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00585 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00592 bool append(T *aObject)
00593 {
00594     if(aObject==NULL) {
00595         std::cout<<"ArrayPtrs.append: ERR- NULL pointer."<<std::endl;
00596         return(false);
00597     }
00598 
00599     // ENSURE CAPACITY
00600     if((_size+1)>=_capacity) {
00601         int newCapacity;
00602         bool success;
00603         success = computeNewCapacity(_size+1,newCapacity);
00604         if(!success) return(success);
00605         success = ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00606         if(!success) return(success);
00607     }
00608 
00609     // SET
00610     _array[_size] = aObject;
00611     _size++;
00612 
00613     return(true);
00614 }
00615 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00622 bool append(ArrayPtrs<T> &aArray)
00623 {
00624     // LOOP THROUGH THE ELEMENTS
00625     bool success;
00626     int i,n=aArray.getSize();
00627     for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
00628         success = append(aArray[i]);
00629         if(!success) return(success);
00630     }
00631 
00632     return(true);
00633 }
00634 
00635 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00636 // INSERT
00637 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00638 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00654 bool insert(int aIndex,T *aObject)
00655 {
00656     // NULL POINTER
00657     if(aObject==NULL) {
00658         std::cout<<"ArrayPtrs.insert: ERR- NULL pointer."<<std::endl;
00659         return(false);
00660     }
00661 
00662     // NEGATIVE INDEX
00663     if(aIndex<0) {
00664         printf("ArrayPtrs.insert: ERR- aIndex was less than 0.\n");
00665         return(false);
00666     }
00667 
00668     // INDEX PAST END OF ARRAY
00669     if(aIndex>_size) {
00670         return(false);
00671     }
00672 
00673     // ENSURE CAPACITY
00674     if((_size+1)>=_capacity) {
00675         int newCapacity;
00676         bool success;
00677         success = computeNewCapacity(_size+1,newCapacity);
00678         if(!success) return(success);
00679         success = ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00680         if(!success) return(success);
00681     }
00682 
00683     // SHIFT ARRAY
00684     int i;
00685     for(i=_size;i>aIndex;i--) {
00686         _array[i] = _array[i-1];
00687     }
00688 
00689     // SET
00690     _array[aIndex] = aObject;
00691     _size++;
00692 
00693     return(true);
00694 }
00695 
00696 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00697 // REMOVE
00698 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00699 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00713 bool remove(int aIndex)
00714 {
00715     if(aIndex<0) {
00716         return(false);
00717     }
00718     if(aIndex>=_size) {
00719         return(false);
00720     }
00721 
00722     // DELETE CURRENT OBJECT
00723     if(getMemoryOwner()&&(_array[aIndex]!=NULL)) delete _array[aIndex];
00724 
00725     // SHIFT ARRAY
00726     int i;
00727     _size--;
00728     for(i=aIndex;i<_size;i++) {
00729         _array[i] = _array[i+1];
00730     }
00731     _array[_size] = NULL;
00732 
00733     return(true);
00734 }
00735 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00748 bool remove(const T* aObject)
00749 {
00750     int index = getIndex(aObject);
00751     return( remove(index) );
00752 }
00753

00755 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00756 // SET AND GET
00757 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00758 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00773 bool set(int aIndex,T *aObject)
00774 {
00775     if(aIndex<0) return(false);
00776     if(aIndex>_size) return(false);
00777 
00778     // APPEND
00779     if(aIndex==_size) {
00780         bool success;
00781         success = append(aObject);
00782         return(success);
00783     }
00784 
00785     // SET
00786     if(getMemoryOwner() && (_array[aIndex]!=NULL)) delete _array[aIndex];
00787     _array[aIndex] = aObject;
00788 
00789     return(true);
00790 }
00791 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00807 T* get(int aIndex)
00808 {
00809     if((aIndex<0)||(aIndex>=_size)) {
00810         throw(Exception("ArrayPtrs.get: Array index out of bounds."));
00811     }
00812     if(_array[aIndex]==NULL) {
00813         throw(Exception("ArrayPtrs.get: NULL pointer.",
00814             __FILE__,__LINE__));
00815     }
00816 
00817     return(_array[aIndex]);
00818 }
00819 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00835 #ifndef SWIG
00836 const T* get(int aIndex) const
00837 {
00838     if((aIndex<0)||(aIndex>=_size)) {
00839         throw(Exception("ArrayPtrs.get: Array index out of bounds."));
00840     }
00841     if(_array[aIndex]==NULL) {
00842         throw(Exception("ArrayPtrs.get: NULL pointer.",
00843             __FILE__,__LINE__));
00844     }
00845 
00846     return(_array[aIndex]);
00847 }
00848 #endif
00849 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00861 T* get(const std::string &aName)
00862 {
00863     int index = getIndex(aName);
00864     if(index==-1) {
00865         std::string msg = "ArrayPtrs.get(aName): No object with name ";
00866         msg += aName;
00867         //TODO JPL throw( Exception(msg,__FILE__,__LINE__) );
00868         return NULL;
00869     }
00870     return(_array[index]);
00871 }
00872 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00884 #ifndef SWIG
00885 const T* get(const std::string &aName) const
00886 {
00887     int index = getIndex(aName);
00888     if(index==-1) {
00889         std::string msg = "ArrayPtrs.get(aName): No object with name ";
00890         msg += aName;
00891         throw( Exception(msg,__FILE__,__LINE__) );
00892     }
00893     return(_array[index]);
00894 }
00895 #endif
00896 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00903 T* getLast() const
00904 {
00905     if(_size<=0) {
00906         throw(Exception("Array is empty."));
00907     }
00908     return(_array[_size-1]);
00909 }

00912 //=============================================================================
00913 // SEARCH
00914 //=============================================================================
00915 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00947 int searchBinary(const T &aObject,bool aFindFirst=false,
00948                       int aLo=-1,int aHi=-1) const
00949 {
00950     if(_size<=0) return(-1);
00951     int lo = aLo;  if(lo<0) lo = 0;
00952     int hi = aHi;  if((hi<0)||(hi>=_size)) hi = _size - 1;
00953     int mid;
00954 
00955     // CHECK lo AND hi
00956     if(lo>hi) return(-1);
00957 
00958     // SEARCH
00959     while(lo <= hi) {
00960         mid = (lo + hi) / 2;
00961         if(aObject < *_array[mid]) {
00962             hi = mid - 1;
00963         } else if(*_array[mid] < aObject) {
00964             lo = mid + 1;
00965         } else {
00966             break;
00967         }
00968     }
00969 
00970     // MAKE SURE LESS THAN
00971     if(aObject < *_array[mid]) mid--;
00972     if(mid<=0) {
00973         return(mid);
00974     }
00975 
00976     // FIND FIRST
00977     if(aFindFirst) {
00978         if(*_array[mid-1]<*_array[mid]) {
00979             return(mid);
00980         }
00981         lo = aLo;  if(lo<0) lo = 0;
00982         hi = mid;
00983         int mid2 = mid;
00984         T *obj2 = _array[mid];
00985         while(lo <= hi) {
00986             mid2 = (lo + hi) / 2;
00987             if(*_array[mid2] == *obj2) {
00988                 hi = mid2 - 1;
00989             } else if(*_array[mid2] < *obj2) {
00990                 lo = mid2 + 1;
00991             }
00992         }
00993         if(*_array[mid2] < *obj2) mid2++;
00994         if(mid2<mid) mid = mid2;
00995     }
00996 
00997     return(mid);
00998 }
